column1: It is  to be  noted that in  civil  actions, the  burden  of proof of a fact  lies  on  the party
who asserts the existence of that fact. Section 102 of the Evidence Ordinance enacts

column2: that lithe burden of proof in a suit or proceeding lies on that person who would fail if
